about_the_game: The hot sizzling Arizona desert is the perfect place for a new Off-road Masters episode. Gravel Channel returns to the U.S.A. with new tracks and spectacular Wild Rush races organized around a dam on the Colorado River.
detailed_description: The hot sizzling Arizona desert is the perfect place for a new Off-road Masters episode. Gravel Channel returns to the U.S.A. with new tracks and spectacular Wild Rush races organized around a dam on the Colorado River.

name: Gravel Colorado River

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500, AMD FX-8100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more / AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600, AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: The hot sizzling Arizona desert is the perfect place for a new Off-road Masters episode. Gravel Channel returns to the U.S.A. with new tracks and spectacular Wild Rush races organized around a dam on the Colorado River.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
